items.content_html: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.

items.content_html: A lightweight DNS server implementation created to handle DNS requests from clients and return responses with resolved DNS records is the DNS Resolver Server project. It is intended to resolve DNS queries via UDP and offers a straightforward yet effective method of handling DNS requests from clients.
items.title: mahendra8-2577393/Bharaqt_Dns_Frontend: A lightweight DNS server implementation created to handle DNS requests from clients and return responses with resolved DNS records is the DNS Resolver Server project. It is intended to resolve DNS queries via UDP and offers a straightforward yet effective method of handling DNS requests from clients.

items.content_html: jSuites is a collection of lightweight common required javascript web components. It is composed of fully responsive vanilla plugins to help you bring the best user experience to your projects, independent of the platform. Same JS codebase across different platforms.

items.content_html: Copy Tab URLs: A Chrome extension that simplifies copying URLs from multiple tabs. With one click, copy URLs from all open tabs or just the current window. Features include automatic URL formatting, real-time feedback, and usage statistics. Streamline your browsing workflow with this lightweight, user-friendly tool.

With one click, copy URLs from all open tabs or just the current window. Features include automatic URL formatting, real-time feedback, and usage statistics. Streamline your browsing workflow with this lightweight, user-friendly tool.
